description: Manages public IP address associations on Apache CloudStack based clouds.

account.description: Account the IP address is related to.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

poll_async.description: Poll async jobs until job has finished.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the IP address is related to.

domain.description: Domain the IP address is related to.

zone.description: Name of the zone in which the IP address is in. If not set, default zone is used.

ip_address.description: Public IP address. Required if C(state=absent)

vpc.description: VPC the IP address is related to.

network.description: Network the IP address is related to.
